entry.title: Amazon in the community: Here’s what’s happening in Seattle, Bellevue, and the Puget Sound
entry.summary: Learn how we invest in the community, help power the local economy, and support our employees in the Puget Sound region.

entry.title: Amazon unveils the next generation of AI-powered Echo devices, purpose-built for Alexa+
entry.summary: Introducing our most advanced Echo devices yet, featuring premium audio, next-generation AI processing and Omnisense sensor fusion for more proactive and personalized Alexa+ experiences.

entry.title: Prime Video introduces new immersive features to watch the NBA on Prime
entry.summary: Features include opt-in personalized bet tracking with FanDuel, customizable Multiview, and AI-powered Key Moments and Rapid Recap.

entry.title: Amazon unveils redesigned Kindle Scribe lineup with first-ever color Scribe
entry.summary: The all-new Kindle Scribe lineup is thinner, lighter, and faster with new productivity features, including AI-powered notebook search.

entry.title: What’s new on Prime Video in October, including ‘Play Dirty,’ ‘Hazbin Hotel,’ and more
entry.summary: Check out what films, series, sports, and fresh episodes are premiering this month on the streaming service.

entry.title: Submit a Media Inquiry | Blue Origin
entry.summary: If you’re a member of the press, please contact us at media@blueorigin.com with your inquiry and deadline.

entry.title: Gallery | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Images available for download. Please credit Blue Origin.

entry.title: Blue Origin and Luxembourg Partner on Oasis-1 Mission to Map Lunar Resources | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin today announced Project Oasis, a multi-phase initiative to identify key lunar resources from orbit, assess them on the ground, and harness them in situ.

entry.title: Florida Investment Matches Our Ambitious Growth Plans | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin employs nearly 4,000 people in Brevard County and has invested over $2.3 billion with 500 suppliers in Florida, generating significant economic growth and employment in the region.

entry.title: Blue Origin Completes 35th New Shepard Mission | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin successfully completed its 35th New Shepard flight and 15th payload mission today from Launch Site One in West Texas.

entry.title: Blue Alchemist Hits Major Milestone Toward Permanent and Sustainable Lunar Infrastructure | Blue Origin
entry.summary: Blue Origin's pioneering in-space resource utilization system, Blue Alchemist, has successfully completed its Critical Design Review, marking a transformative milestone toward humanity's permanent expansion beyond Earth.

entry.title: Community
entry.summary: We look for uniquely Amazonian and innovative ways to make positive, lasting impacts and encourage our employees to champion causes they care about.

entry.title: Entertainment
entry.summary: Stories about the latest apps and games, movies, TV shows, and music available from Amazon Prime Video, Amazon Music, and Kindle.

entry.title: Devices
entry.summary: Stories and information about Amazon devices, such as Kindle e-readers, Fire tablets, Fire TV streaming media players, Echo devices, Dash Buttons, and more.
